scripts.dev: npm i @coderline/alphatab@1.5.0 && node ./scripts/merge-styles.js --dir src/styles && node esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.dev:refactor: npm i @coderline/alphatab@1.6.0 && node ./scripts/merge-styles.js --dir src-refactor/styles && node esbuild.config.mjs --refactor
scripts.build: npm i @coderline/alphatab@1.5.0 && node ./scripts/merge-styles.js --dir src/styles && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.build:refactor: npm i @coderline/alphatab@1.6.0 && node ./scripts/merge-styles.js --dir src-refactor/styles && tsc -p tsconfig.refactor.json -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production --refactor
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
